page.title: 19Drusillas Wine Centre
page.content:
Drusillas Wine Centre is famous in the south of England for its fine English wines. Some of the wine is produced at the English Wine Centre,but the majority is produced elsewhere in Sussex. The quantity of the wine is less favoured than the quality.
There is a small demonstration vineyard at the Wine Centre. In one barn there is old equipment that was used to make wine & cider,dating from the 1700's. The main building is the Walton Oak Barn which dates from 1770. Traditional English Gourmet dinners take place at the Wine Centre and this occurs in the thatched barn when the numbers are large. Wine tasting is another great attraction. Each year there is a wine festival and a wine run to France.
